channel.title: Amsterdam on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Amsterdam on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: LA HOLLANDE, ALLEZ-Y MAINTENANT!
item.description: Seeing one of friend’s photographs we were so excited to visit that place. That, in our last trip to Amsterdam (May 2003) we tried to visit that - but alas! Local people told us that Tulip season is already over. But deep down in our heart we wanted to visit that place particularly Keukenhof thinking -maybe next year. Then we were in touch with Holland tourism in-order to know more about Keukenhof.

item.title: Trip to Amsterdam (June 7th-9th)
item.description: Our first trip in Europe, I decided about Amsterdam because of two reason Van Gogh and people of Amsterdam. To our delight it was really great and was a great escape from noise and crowd of Paris.The city is not so big compared to Paris but very clean and friendly. As most tourist books suggest Dutch people has unique and very efficient solution to their day-to-day problem. The streets are not crowded with car.
